trans-unit.source: Represents information about a character hit within a glyph run.
trans-unit.target: 글리프 런(Glyph Run) 내의 적중한 문자에 대한 정보를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit> structure provides information about the index of the first character that got hit as well as information about leading or trailing edge.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit> 구조는 선행 또는 후행 가장자리에 대 한 정보 뿐만 아니라 적중 첫 번째 문자의 인덱스에 대 한 정보를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Index of the first character that got hit.
In the case of a leading edge, this value is 0.
In the case of a trailing edge, this value is the number of code points until the next valid caret position.
trans-unit.target: 후행 가장자리의 경우 이 값은 유효한 다음 캐럿 위치까지의 코드 포인트 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> structure.
Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 개체와 현재 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> 개체가 같은지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> object.
Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 개체와 현재 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> 개체가 같은지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" />이 현재 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> 개체와 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="obj" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> object, <see langword="false" /> is returned.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> object.

Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> object.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" />이 현재 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> 개체와 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the first character that got hit.
trans-unit.target: 적중한 첫 번째 문자의 인덱스를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the index.
Serves as a hash function for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" />.
It is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 해시 알고리즘 및 해시 테이블과 같은 데이터 구조에서 사용하기에 적합합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the hash code for the current object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 개체에 대한 해시 코드를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> to compare.
The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> to compare.
Compare two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> strings for equality.

<see langword="true" /> when the values of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit.FirstCharacterIndex" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit.TrailingLength" /> properties are equal for both objects; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 두 개체에 대해 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit.FirstCharacterIndex" /> 및 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit.TrailingLength" /> 속성 값이 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> to compare.
The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> to compare.
Compare two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> strings for inequality.

<see langword="false" /> when the values of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit.FirstCharacterIndex" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit.TrailingLength" /> properties are equal for both objects; otherwise, <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 두 개체에 대해 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit.FirstCharacterIndex" /> 및 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit.TrailingLength" /> 속성 값이 같으면 <see langword="false" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="true" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the trailing length value for the character that got hit.
trans-unit.target: 적중한 문자의 후행 길이 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the trailing length.
In the case of a leading edge, this value is 0.
In the case of a trailing edge, this value is the number of code points until the next valid caret position.
trans-unit.target: 후행 가장자리의 경우 이 값은 유효한 다음 캐럿 위치까지의 코드 포인트 수입니다.
